price: İnsanlardan eləsi də var ki, Allahın razılığını qazanmaq üçün canını da verər. Allah Öz qullarına qarşı çox şəfqətlidir.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَشۡرِي نَفۡسَهُ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ مَرۡضَاتِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ رَءُوفُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yashrī nafsahu ib'tighāa marḍāti al-lahi wal-lahu raūfun bil-ʿibādi
